TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectorySecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity

summary.span: 使用托管 ACL 库的对象安全层来包装目录对象的访问控制功能。

span.span: Uses the object security layer of the managed ACL library to wrap access control functionality for directory objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetAccessRule(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 此操作应用于的 对象。

span.span: The object to which this operation applies.

summary.span: 在对象的 DACL 中搜索所有所包含的安全标识符 (SID) 与 对象中指定的 SID 相匹配的访问规则，并将所有这些访问规则替换为 对象中包含的访问规则。

span.span: Searches an object's DACL for all access rules that contain a security identifier (SID) that matches the SID specified in the object, and replaces all of those access rules with the access rules that are contained in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用于替换在对象的 DACL，这两个允许和拒绝类型规则会替换特定的 SID 的所有访问规则。When is used to replace all access rules with a particular SID in an object's DACL, both Allow- and Deny- type rules are replaced. 将仅允许规则而不会影响拒绝规则，或替换而不会影响允许规则的拒绝规则，请使用相反。To replace only Allow rules without affecting Deny rules, or to replace Deny rules without affecting Allow rules, use instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetAccessRule(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 此操作应用于的 对象。

span.span: The object to which this operation applies.

summary.span: 在对象的 DACL 中搜索所有所包含的安全标识符 (SID) 与 对象中指定的 SID 相匹配且访问控制类型（“允许”或“拒绝”）与 对象中指定的类型相匹配的访问规则，并将所有这些访问规则替换为 对象中包含的访问规则。

span.span: Searches an object's DACL for all access rules that contain a security identifier (SID) that matches the SID specified in the object, and an access control type (Allow or Deny) that matches the type specified in the object, and replaces all of those access rules with the access rules that are contained in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用于替换特定的 SID 和访问控制类型 （允许或拒绝） 中对象的 DACL，所有规则，因为具有匹配的 SID 和访问 SID 和类型的 DACL 控件中包含的类型匹配的所有访问规则`rule`对象 ar替换为 e。When is used to replace all access rules that match a particular SID and access control type (Allow or Deny) in an object's DACL, all rules in that DACL with an SID and type that match the SID and access control type contained in the `rule` object are replaced. 使用此方法，开发人员可以为该对象上该 SID 替换任何允许的规则，而不会影响现有的拒绝规则，或为该对象上该 SID 替换所有的拒绝规则，而不会影响现有的允许规则。Using this method, the developer can replace any Allow rules for that SID on that object without affecting existing Deny rules, or replace all Deny rules for that SID on that object without affecting existing Allow rules. 若要替换为与指定的 SID，无论何种类型，有关该对象的所有规则使用相反。To replace all rules for that object pertaining to the specified SID, regardless of type, use instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetAuditRule(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAuditRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 此操作应用于的 对象。

span.span: The object to which this operation applies.

summary.span: 将所有安全标识符与对象的 SACL 中指定审核规则相同的审核规则替换为指定的审核规则。

span.span: Replaces all audit rules that contain the same security identifier as the specified audit rule in the SACL of an object with the specified audit rule.
